title: Laura Loomer: Far-right conspiracy theorist and Trump supporter
shortDescription: Laura Loomer, a far-right conspiracy theorist and Trump supporter has lost two Congressional races in Florida.

title: Trump backs the push for new parents to vote by proxy in the House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Thursday said he supports Florida Republican Rep. Anna Paulina Luna’s push to allow new parents to vote by proxy.

title: Trump administration set to freeze Brown University grants
shortDescription: Human rights advocates and academic experts have condemned the moves as an assault on free speech and academic freedom.

title: GOP senator calls Jewish Democrat Schumer 'Fuhrer'
shortDescription: Bernie Moreno called Senate Democrats 'sheep that follow the Fuhrer Schumer's orders.'

title: Trump countries will negotiate post tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said "every country" has called him to negotiate after his tariff announcement.

title: China lashes back at Trump with 34% tariff on US goods
shortDescription: The Trump administration imposed a 10% minimum tariff on all imports coming into the country and even higher tariffs on other top trading partners.

title: Hundreds of thousands expected at Saturday's anti-Trump protests
shortDescription: Over 1,000 anti-Trump protests, both big and small, are scheduled across America Saturday

title: Trump fires top boss at NSA, nation's elite spy agency
shortDescription: Gen. Timothy Haugh, who was chief of U.S. Cyber Command in addition to leading the NSA, was fired by the Trump administration Thursday night.

title: Senate confirms Dr. Oz to lead Medicare, Medicaid
shortDescription: The Senate confirmed Dr. Oz 53-45, along party lines, to lead the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.

title: People on Wall Street react to sinking stocks
shortDescription: People on Wall Street reacted to the stock market downturn from Trump's tariffs announcement with a mix of worry and optimism.

title: Senate Republicans move to advance Trump's tax cuts
shortDescription: After weeks of an impasse, lawmakers have decided to move forward without a real agreement on spending cuts.

title: Senate confirms Mehmet Oz to lead Medicare, Medicaid agency
shortDescription: The daytime television host and surgeon will lead the agency that oversees health coverage for millions of Americans.

title: Republican lawmakers downplay Trump's talk of a potential third term
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s allies on Capitol Hill laughed off his recent remarks about pursuing a potential third term.

title: Trump says 'market's gonna boom' as Wall Street nosedives
shortDescription: The S&P 500 was down 3.4% and the Dow Jones Industrial Average was down more than 1,100 points or 2.6% at 12:40 p.m.

title: Trump tariffs list calls Taiwan a country. And China noticed
shortDescription: Taiwan was listed as a country the top of a cardboard sign held up by Trump during his tariff ceremony. But it isn't one, and China is not happy.
